select seq_ord_code.nextval from dual
insert into order_t (ord_code, u_id, ord_name, ord_zip_code, ord_addr, ord_deaddr, ord_phone, ord_price, ord_desc) values(#{ord_code}, #{u_id}, #{ord_name}, #{ord_zip_code}, #{ord_addr}, #{ord_deaddr}, #{ord_phone}, #{ord_price}, #{ord_desc})

insert into ordt_t(ord_code, pro_num, dt_amount, dt_price) select #{ord_code}, p.pro_num, c.cart_amount, p.pro_disprice from cart_t c inner join product_t p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.u_id = #{u_id}
mapper.select: select o.ord_code, o.u_id, o.ord_name, o.ord_zip_code, o.ord_addr, o.ord_deaddr, o.ord_phone, o.ord_price, o.ord_desc, o.ord_regdate, ot.pro_num, ot.dt_amount, ot.dt_price, p.pro_name, p.pro_up_folder, p.pro_img, p.pro_disprice from order_t o inner join ordt_t ot on o.ord_code = ot.ord_code inner join product_t p on ot.pro_num = p.pro_num where o.u_id = #{u_id} order by o.ord_code desc

select o.ord_code, o.u_id, o.ord_name, o.ord_zip_code, o.ord_addr, o.ord_deaddr, o.ord_phone, o.ord_price, o.ord_desc, o.ord_regdate, ot.pro_num, ot.dt_amount, ot.dt_price, p.pro_name, p.pro_up_folder, p.pro_img, p.pro_disprice from order_t o inner join ordt_t ot on o.ord_code = ot.ord_code inner join product_t p on ot.pro_num = p.pro_num where o.u_id = #{u_id} order by o.ord_code desc
